tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
Dr Praveen Tiwari is our family doctor. We visit him whenever we face any health related issues. His experience make him calm and composed. On June 2020 I suffered from covid-19, we went to him and he gave us satisfaction that everything will be fine if we remain patient.
I am one of his early visitors and I feel extremely gratitude to him for being so kind and humble and keeping me and my family fit and going.

tags: None
review: Me and my whole family was tested positive for Covid-19 in November 2020. I visited Dr. Praveen Tiwari he was very polite and kind. He is a very experienced doctor ..it was because of his consultation and care and prescription that we were able to recover so quickly. i would like to extend my thanks to Dr praveen and suhani clinic for their care and consultation. i highly recommend Dr. Praveen Tiwari.

tags: None
review:
I visited to Dr praveen Tiwari in 2018 with complaints of cough and cold during this diagnosed as hypertension. and Dr Tiwari sir prescribed medication and advised to change my lifestyle and i followed his advisory and medications and now my BP is controlled. I always advise to my relatives, friends whose stay in delhi NCR specially delhi and noida. If you people having any problem then go to suhani clinic(DDA market suhani clinic vasundhara inclave delhi)and consult with Dr.Praveen tiwari sir.
Thank u sir.

tags: Treatment satisfaction,
review: The dr is friendly, nice and very patiently listening to my problem. He was kind enough to message me the things and details. He was accurate in his approach and it was quite a holistic one.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Value for money,Treatment satisfaction,
review: He is a very humble doctor and explains the problem and the treatment very patiently. His diagnosis is quick and accurate. He doesn't believe in instilling fears or insecurities associated with complete wellbeing.  Thank you so much!

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: He was very kind during the consultation and gave the proper medication which helped immensely. I will definitely recommend him.
